name: Beyond R
description:
A platform fighting game with Mario & Sonic characters. I don't own any of the characters in this game.

P1 Controls:

Key WASD - Movement

Key F - Normal Attack

Key G - Special Attack

Key R - Block

Key F + G (if P1 special meter = 100) - Ultra Special Attack

P2 Controls:

Arrow Keys - Movement

Key K - Normal Attack

Key L - Special Attack

Key O - Blcok

Key K + L (if P2 special meter = 100) - Ultra Special Attack
